summary: When his long-time disappeared father is entering his life again, Jean-Luc, a successful doctor, has no option but to face his own life story. Will he ever be able to forget and forgive?
cast: Michel Bouquet|Charles Berling|Natacha Régnier|Amira Casar|Stéphane Guillon|Hubert Koundé|Karole Rocher|Marie Micla|Nicole Evans|Philippe Lehembre|Pierre Londiche|Jean-Christophe Lemberton|Manoëlle Gaillard|Etienne Louvet|Claude Koener|Thierry de Carbonnières|Nathalie Mathis|Emanuel Booz|François Berléand
title: Comment j'ai tué mon père
